author: Saikat Das
title: Funds squeezed states pay a steep price
description: Spreads more than doubled to 200 basis points this week with the Kerala state bearing the brunt.
content: MUMBAI: State governments’ borrowing costs surge as many investors drop out of bond auctions due to lockdown and fears that there could be a surge in their borrowings in coming months as they are squeezed by sliding revenues and higher expenses to treat the p… [+2339 chars]
